translations.translation: On that Day, woe to the deniers!
Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
Woe on that Day to those that give the lie to the Truth!
On that day, woe will be to those who have rejected God's revelations!
Ruin is for the deniers on that day!
Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!
Woe on that day to the rejecters.
Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!
Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth.
Woe on that day Unto the beliers
Woe to the deniers on that day!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!
Woe on that Day to those who belied it!
Woe on that Day to the liars.
Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
[77:15] Woe to the deniers on that day! — a threat of chastisement for them.

(Woe) a valley in Gehenna running with blood and puss; and it is also said: a well in the Fire; and it is also said that this refers to severe punishment (unto the repudiators) the disbelievers in Allah, the Scripture, the Messenger and resurrection after death (on that day) the Day of Judgement!

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبالجملة: { وَيْلٌ } وهلاك مؤيد مستمر { يَوْمَئِذٍ } أي: في يوم الفصل { لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ } [المرسلات: 15] به
 المنكرين له في النشأة الأولى
 سيما بعد إخبار الرسل والكتب
 وكيف يكذبونه وينكرون عليه أولئك الضالون المكذبون
 مع أنهم قد سمعوا حال المكذبين المنكرين المَّاضين؟!
